base_description: Professional business cards available in a variety of stocks and finishes.

variants.name: 16pt Matte
variants.description: A sturdy, professional cardstock with a non-reflective matte finish.

variants.name: 32pt Glossy
variants.description: An extra-thick, durable card with a vibrant, high-gloss UV coating.
variants.generation_keywords: 32pt thick cardstock, high-gloss UV coating, vibrant colors, light reflecting off surface

variants.name: None
variants.description: Clean and simple, with no extra finish.

variants.name: Gold Foil
variants.description: Elegant gold foil stamping for a touch of luxury.
variants.generation_keywords: gold foil stamping, luxurious accents, metallic highlights

base_description: Durable, weather-resistant banners for indoor and outdoor use.

variants.name: 13oz Vinyl
variants.description: Glossy, durable vinyl perfect for outdoor advertisements.
variants.generation_keywords: 13oz glossy vinyl, weather-resistant, outdoor setting, grommets visible

variants.name: Mesh
variants.description: Perforated mesh material that allows wind to pass through, ideal for fences.
variants.generation_keywords: perforated mesh banner, on construction fence, allows wind to pass through
